trans-unit.source: Specifies the class identifier of a coclass imported from a type library.
trans-unit.target: 指定從類型程式庫匯入之 Coclass 的類別識別項。

trans-unit.source: You can apply this attribute to coclass interfaces, although the [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) typically applies it for you when it imports a type library.
trans-unit.target: 您可以套用至 coclass 介面，這個屬性，雖然[Tlbimp.exe （類型程式庫匯入工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)通常會套用它為您匯入類型程式庫時。

trans-unit.source: When Tlbimp.exe imports a coclass, it produces a managed class and an interface to represent the coclass.
trans-unit.target: Tlbimp.exe 匯入 coclass 時，會產生的 managed 的類別和介面代表 coclass。

trans-unit.source: The coclass interface has the same interface identifier (IID) as the default interface of the original coclass.
trans-unit.target: Coclass 介面具有相同的介面識別碼 (IID)，為原始的 coclass 的預設介面。

trans-unit.source: The imported coclass interface also retains the name of the coclass.
trans-unit.target: 匯入的 coclass 介面也會保留 coclass 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Tlbimp.exe appends the original coclass name with "class" to identify the imported class.
trans-unit.target: Tlbimp.exe 會將附加原始 coclass 名稱與 「 類別 」 識別匯入的類別。
您很少會套用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: However, if you plan to write source code that produces metadata that closely simulates metadata produced by Tlbimp.exe, you should create a coclass interface for each coclass.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您計劃撰寫的程式碼會產生能夠模擬 Tlbimp.exe 所產生的中繼資料的中繼資料，您應該建立讓每個 coclass 之介面的 coclass。

trans-unit.source: Use the name of the original coclass to name the coclass interface and derive it from the default interface.
trans-unit.target: 使用原始 coclass 的名稱來命名 coclass 介面並衍生自預設介面。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CoClassAttribute>, you must also apply the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComImportAttribute?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.GuidAttribute?displayProperty=nameWithType> attributes to the coclass interface.
trans-unit.target: 除了<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CoClassAttribute>，您還必須套用<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComImportAttribute?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.GuidAttribute?displayProperty=nameWithType>coclass 介面屬性。

trans-unit.source: For additional information about how Tlbimp.exe imports interfaces and coclasses from a type library, see [Imported Type Conversion](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cb1ee67d-8ef0-4e40-b2a5-13714b9f33c3(v=vs.100)).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何 Tlbimp.exe 匯入的介面和 coclass 從類型程式庫的詳細資訊，請參閱[匯入類型轉換](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cb1ee67d-8ef0-4e40-b2a5-13714b9f33c3(v=vs.100))。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that contains the class identifier of the original coclass.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" />，包含原始 Coclass 的類別識別項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CoClassAttribute" /> with the class identifier of the original coclass.
trans-unit.target: 使用原始 Coclass 的類別識別項，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.CoClassAttribute" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the class identifier of the original coclass.
trans-unit.target: 取得原始 Coclass 的類別識別項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> containing the class identifier of the original coclass.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" />，包含原始 Coclass 的類別識別項。
